info.name: Slack: Hide sidebar when window is narrow
info.description: Slack doesn't support narrow windows. This hides the sidebar, always or when needed. Thanks to 0atman and Robin.
info.additionalInfo: Latest update (21 March 2018): Always wrap words, not just when sidebar is collapsed. Tips: By default, this stylesheet hides the sidebar when the window is narrower than 600 CSS pixels. You can also choose to leave it always hidden. To navigate when the sidebar is invisible you can use keyboard shortcuts; type /keys for a list of those. Credits and notes Based on code by 0atman and Robin. A feature request has been submitted to Slack.
